Highest level of education achieved values

Codes representing possible values for the Highest level of education achieved element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EducationLevel
    CodeDisplay
    HSHigh SchoolHigh School or secondary school degree complete
    ELEMElementary educationElementary School
  • Include these codes as defined in http://who.int/cg/CodeSystem/extended-content
    CodeDisplay
    NONENo education

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

name: highest-level-of-education-achieved-values
title: Highest level of education achieved values
description: Codes representing possible values for the Highest level of education achieved element
